actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide a tax credit for expenditures to remove architectural and transportation barriers to the handicapped and elderly.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to provide an investment tax credit for expenditures to remove architectural and transportation barriers to the handicapped and the elderly.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide a tax credit for expenditures to remove architectural and transportation barriers to the handicapped and elderly.
